hints.content:
We can think of subtraction as:

$\maroonD{\text{total}} - \blueE{\text{part}} = \goldE{\text{ part}}$

We can relate subtraction to addition:

$\maroonD{\text{total}} = \blueE{\text{part}} + \goldE{\text{ part}}$

So, we can add $\blueE{18}$ to $\goldE{67}$ to find the $\maroonD{\text{total}}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/952363dda47b7620de91bd8ae0586d9431f30569)

question.content:
**What number makes this equation true?**  
*Hint: Use the place value blocks to help solve.*

 [[☃ numeric-input 1]] ${}- 18=67$  

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/4794a8342359f16a32462a6916ec2fc5adae0fd4)
